SEARCH
Package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.dto

Class GameDTO

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.dto.GameDTO
public class GameDTO extends Object
This serves as the interface between the outside world and the server internals for the Game entity. The GameDTO determines what a user may see.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameDTO()
    Default, no parameter constructor
    GameDTO(Game game, UserGame userGame)
    This constructor is populated by Game and has the logic for determining whose turn it is.

    • isUsersTurn

      public boolean isUsersTurn()
      Returns the usersTurn flag. This flag is set for a particular userGame when the turn count of the usergame matches the turn count of the game.
